title: The Dan Bilzerian Interview: Slowing Down on Partying & Girls, Million Dollar Watch Theft & More
description:
Adam links up with Dan Bilzerian at his estate to talk about making money and more money, becoming a billionaire, his book, Twitter, how to get girls and more! ----- 00:00 Intro 1:33 - Dan gives Adam a tour of the estate: kitchen, hockey rink, batting cage, rock wall, trampoline, cars, pool(s), skatepark 4:55 - Dan said he wouldn’t do a No Jumper interview until Adam read his book 15:14 - Explains the perfect number of girls to bring on vacation (anywhere between 3 and 8). Going through phases of being a rockstar and settling down. 30:33 - Viral moment when he asked Twitter for book title suggestions. Cultural shift during quarantine made haters wake up. 34:01 - Trying to avoid becoming "Villain of the Day" on Twitter. Not understanding the over-emphasis on race in the country in recent years. Corporate activism. 39:54 - Always considered himself a liberal until recently 47:30 - Getting a million dollar watch stolen at the Canello fight. Having a strong stomach for losses from playing so much poker. 1:00:15 - Explaining why he prefers playing cash games vs poker tournaments 1:02:55 - Dan explains why he preferred Doug Polk’s strategy vs. Daniel Negreanu, and how poker is more mathematical these days 1:21:15 - Dan approves of online “manosphere” teaching men how to be manly men. Thinks Men today are soft. 1:40:15 - The BBL revolution is not it! Too many girls have them these days. Experience with all the ways girls get enhancements 1:43:25 - Importance of accountability and embracing who you are. Dan never apologizes or hides his past 1:45:10 - Dan’s advice to young guys on how to get girls. Reading “The Game”. Be confident and not catering to the other person too much. Get over caring about being rejected. 1:56:58 - The last thing on Dan’s bucket list is to become a billionaire. Wants to do a reset where he works at Walmart for 6 months living in a small apartment. ----- Shout to our Partners at Gamer Supps!
